520:1: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcideva pradeśaṃ sacenme bhagavānavakāśaṃ kuryāt praṣṭavyapraśnavyākaraṇāya |
520:2: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-tena hyānanda svake āsane niṣadya pṛccha tvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yad yadevākāṅkṣasi,
520:3: ahaṃ te tasya tasya praśnasya vyākaraṇena cittamārādhayiṣye |
520:6: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ purataḥ āsane niṣadya bhagavantametadavocat- ko nu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadiha ekatyā bodhisattvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā hastacchedān pādacchedān karṇacchedānakṣyutpāṭanāni aṅgottamāṅgacchedān nigacchanti pratyaṅgacchedāṃśca ?
520:10: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-sacet tvamānanda jānīyā yāni me duḥkhāni pratyanubhūtāni imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samudānayitum,
520:13: tad yathāpi nāma ānanda iha kāścideva puruṣaḥ adhastāt pādatalamupādāya yāvanmūrdhakādādīpto bhavet prajvalitaḥ ekajvālībhūtaḥ,
520:14: taṃ kaścideva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vadet-ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti |
520:15: tat kiṃ manyase ānanda api tu sa puruṣaḥ anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍeta rameta paricārayeta ?
520:17: bhagavānāha-krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo rameta paricārayeta parikalpamupādāyānirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ |
520:18: na tveva tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇasya sattvāṃstribhirupāyairduḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrānnābhūt sukhaṃ vā saumanasyaṃ vā cittapraharṣo vā |
520:19: ye ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā akhaṇḍaśīlā bhavanti achidraśīlāḥ akalmāṣaśīlā aśabalaśīlāḥ aparāmṛṣṭaśīlāḥ acalitaśīlāḥ,
520:25: te ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anantāṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇā na hastacchedena parihāṇiṃ nigacchanti |
520:33: tena kālena tena samayena ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
520:34: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya navatikalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt |
520:35: sarvatra ca divase navatikalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi sattvānāmavaivartikatāyāṃ buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
520:36: tena khalu punarānanda samayena tasya bhagavato ratnapadmacandraviśuddhābhyudgatarājñastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya caramikāyāṃ pañcāśati saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne ime evaṃrūpāḥ sūtrāntā bahujanajugupsitā bahujanavivarjitā bahujanaviruddhā mahājanotsṛṣṭāścābhūvan |
520:37: mahābhayabhairavakāle vartamāne mahopadrave ativṛṣṭikālasamaye anāvṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne vyālakālasamaye vartamāne vidyutkāntārakalpasamaye durbhikṣakālasamaye mithyādṛṣṭikālasamaye asamyagdṛṣṭikālasamaye tīrthikamantraparyeṣṭikālasamaye buddhabodheḥ pralujyamānakālasamaye vartamāne sapta bodhisattvasahasrāṇi grāmanagaranigamarā rājadhānījanapadebhyo nirvāsitāni samantabhadraṃ nāma vanakhaṇḍaṃ tadupaniśritya viharanti sma sārdhaṃ supuṣpacandreṇa dharmabhāṇakena,
520:39: sa khalu punā rājā supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇaka eko rahogataḥ pratisaṃlīno divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣeṇa paśyati sma-bahvīrbodhisattvakoṭiravaruptakuśalamūlā anyonyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ ihopapannāḥ |
520:44: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya yenāsau mahān bodhisattvagaṇastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya taṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇametadavocat- gamiṣyāmaḥ kulaputrāḥ |
520:46: atha khalu sa mahān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ supuṣpacandraṃ dharmabhāṇakametadavocat-nāsmākamabhipretaṃ yadāyuṣmānito vanaṣaṇḍād grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīravataret |
520:51: āyuṣmāṃścātīva prāsādiko'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prathamayauvanasamanvāgato bhadrake vayasi vartate |
520:52: sa dhautakāñcanahāṭakacchaviḥ śaṅkhakundenduvarṇayorṇayā pratimaṇḍito'pi śobhitalalāṭo nīlakuñcitakeśoṇīṣaśca |
520:53: mā te rājaputrā vā anye vā tatpratimā īrṣyāmātsaryopahacetaso jīvitādvayavaropayiṣyanti |
520:54: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakastaṃ bodhisattvagaṇametadavocat-sacenme ātmā ārakṣyo bhavet,
520:55: na mayā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane ārakṣā kṛtā bhavet |
520:77: yuṣme bhotha sukhī svakārthu kuruthā gopāyathā ātmanaṃ
520:78: yuṣme bhotha ihāpramatta vinaye maitrīvihārī sadā |
520:79: śīlaṃ rakṣatha ujjvalaṃ aśabalaṃ śuddhaṃ śuci nirmalaṃ
520:80: yehī rakṣitu śīlu bhoti amalaṃ buddhebhi saṃvarṇitam || 6 ||
520:81: yehī satkṛtu bhonti sarvi sugatā yāvanta pūrve abhūt
520:82: tehi trāyitu bhonti sarvajanatā yā bodhisaṃprasthitā |
520:83: tehī uddharitāḥ bhavanti narakā sattvā bahū pāpakāḥ
520:84: yehī rakṣitu bhonti śīlu amalaṃ buddhaiḥ praśastaṃ purā || 7 ||
520:85: dānaṃ detha viśiṣṭa dharmaratanaṃ kṣāntiṃ sadā rakṣathā-
520:86: raṇyaṃ cāśrayathā samādhikuśalā bhāvetha co mārdavam |
520:87: mā co vigraha sarvathā vicarathā śiṣṭāṃ śivāṃ cārikāṃ
520:88: gacchāmo vayu rājadhāni nagaraṃ sattvāna trāṇārthikāḥ || 8 ||
520:90: vartentī imi aśrukāḥ sukaruṇaṃ pādehi anye patī |
520:91: mā hī otarahī mahāmati vidu prekṣa vane pādapān
520:93: te'pī pūrva vināyakā daśabalāḥ śāntendriyāḥ sūratāḥ
520:95: śreṣṭhāṃ cārika bodhihetu caritāste puṇyajñānāṃ varāḥ
520:96: teṣāṃ śikṣihi kānane nivasato mā gaccha tvaṃ suvrata || 10 ||
520:97: gātraṃ citritu lakṣaṇaiḥ suruciraiḥ keśāśca nīlāstavā
520:100: mā te īrṣyu janitva kāyu vikirī rājānurāje tathā || 11 ||
520:101: atha khalvānanda supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇakastaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ gāthayābhyabhāṣata-
520:102: yāvantaḥ parimeṇa āsi sugatāḥ sarvajña kṣīṇāsravāḥ
520:103: sarve te'tha kariṃsu loki tribhave bodhādhigamyāṃ varām |
520:104: śreṣṭhāṃ cārika bodhihetu caritāste puṇyajñānāṃ varāḥ
520:105: teṣāṃ śikṣaya bodhisatva niyutā sattvāna trāṇārthikaḥ || 12 ||
520:106: sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ ṛṣividuṃ pādāni vanditvanā
520:107: ghoraṃ āśvasato svananti karuṇaṃ krandanta ārtasvaram |
520:108: anye chinna prapāta medini patī mūrcchitva sālo yathā
520:109: no cā te parivarti puṇyanicitaḥ sattvārthakāmo ṛṣiḥ || 13 ||
520:110: pātraṃ cīvaru gṛhya prasthitu ṛṣī siṃho yathā kesarī
520:111: no cāsyo guṇadoṣa tatra akarī dharmasvabhāve sthitaḥ |
520:112: ghane kānani asmi loki vasataḥ sattvā apāye pati
520:113: so'bhūttaṃ nagaraṃ gamī puravaraṃ sattvānaṃ trāṇārthikaḥ || 14 ||
520:114: atha khalu supuṣpacandro dharmabhāṇako grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭarājadhānīravataritvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
520:115: tena pūrvāhṇe avataritvā sattvānāṃ navanavati prāṇikoṭyaḥ avaivartiṃkatāyāṃ sthāpitāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
520:118: sa tasyāṃ ratnāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmupasaṃkramitvā anyatarasmin plakṣasālamūle vyahārṣīt |
520:119: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena tāṃ ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ prāviśat |
520:122: sa bhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaṃkramya āsthitaka eva rātriṃdivamatināmayati sma |
520:123: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena dvitīye prāgbhakte ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśya trayoviṃśatiprāṇikoṭīravaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
520:125: sa dvitīyabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaṃkramya utthitaka eva rātriṃdivamatināmayati sma |
520:126: sa tasyāṃ rātryāmatītāyāṃ trirātrabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśya navanavatiprāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇyavaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
520:128: sa trirātrabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaṃkramya utthitaka eva tṛtīyaṃ rātriṃdivamatināmayati sma |
520:129: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena caturthe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśya navanavatiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇyavaivartikabuddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati |
520:130: sa caturdivasabhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaṃkramya utthitaka eva rātriṃdivamatināmayati sma |
520:131: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena pañcame divase ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśya rājño'ntaḥpuraṃ prāviśat |
520:132: pravisya cāśītiṃ strīsahasrāṇyavaivartikatve'nuttarāyāṃ samaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
520:134: sa tasyā rātryā atyayena ṣaṣṭhe prāgbhakte ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśya sahasraṃ rājaputrāṇāmavaivartikatve sthāpayati sma anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
520:135: na ca tāvad bhaktasya kṛtyaṃ karoti sma |
520:136: sa ṣaṣṭhe bhaktacchedacchinno ratnāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yena bhagavato nakhastūpastenopasaṃkramya rātriṃdivamatināmayati sma |
520:137: sa tasya rātryā atyayena saptame purobhakte ratnāvatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśyādrākṣīcchūradattaṃ rājānamudyānamabhiniṣkramantaṃ suvarṇamayena rathena rūpyamayaiḥ pakṣabhiruragasāracandanamayyā īṣayā vaidūryamayaiścakraiḥ ucchritacchatradhvajasamalaṃkṛtena īṣāpaṭṭāvanaddhena dūṣyapaṭṭasaṃchāditena yatrāṣṭau śatāni kumārīṇāṃ ratnasūtraparigṛhītānām,
520:138: yāstaṃ rathaṃ vāhayanti abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhravarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāḥ pritikārye audvilyakārye bālānāṃ na piṇḍatānām |
520:141: pañca ca duhitṛśatāni ratnamayīśibikābhirūḍhāḥ purato niryānti sma |
520:142: tāḥ sahadarśanenaiva tasya bhikṣoravaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |

520:145: atha khalu tā api kumārthaḥ pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcoditāḥ samānāstābhyaḥ śibikābhyo'vataritvā ekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena sa bhi stenāñjāla praṇamya gāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -

520:215: sa ca rājā śūradattastāvat prāsādiko'bhūt tāvaddarśanīyo na ca tāvadabhirūpo yāvadabhirūpaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ |

520:225: tasyaitadabhavat-putrā api me ājñāṃ na kurvanti |
520:228: atha rājñaḥ śūradattasya nandiko nāma vadhyaghātako'bhūt caṇḍaḥ sāhasiko raudraḥ |

520:236: tena hi nandika yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase |
520:241: atha nandikena vadhyaghātakena tasyāmena velāyāṃ tīkṣṇamasiṃ gṛhītvā bhikṣohastapādāśchinnā akṣiṇī cotpāṭite |

520:272: ayaṃ ca etī surabhi sunetro bhikṣu-

520:275: dīrṣyāṃ ca krodhaṃ ca tatra janemi mūḍhaḥ |

520:330: na putra trāṇa na pi mama jñātisaṃgho

520:382: rūpāṇi śabdān rasa tatha gandha śreṣṭhān
520:385: cakṣuṃ ca śrotraṃ tathariva ghrāṇa jihvam || 66 ||
520:386: dāne śikṣitu śīli apratisamaḥ kṣāntiṃ ca vīryaṃ tathā
520:388: lokaḥ sarvu sadevakaḥ samanujaḥ prekṣanti maitryā jinaṃ
520:389: teno cakṣu mahāndhakāragahane budhyanti bodhiṃ śivām || 67 ||
520:392: nagaraṃ rājya tyajitva svarṇasphaṭikāṃ rūpyaṃ pravālāṃstathā
520:394: pūjāṃ co atulāṃ karonti muditāḥ puṣpebhi gandhebhi co
520:395: gṛhya cchatradhvajā patāka vividhā saṃgītibhāṇḍāni ca |
520:396: no cāpī abhinandiṣu bhavagatiṃ jñātvāna śūnyān bhavān
520:397: teno lakṣaṇacitritā daśabalā bhāsanti sarvā diśaḥ || 69 ||
520:402: no ātmasaṃjñā na ca puna sattvasaṃjñā
520:412: na grāmasaṃjñā na ca nagareṣu saṃjñā
520:413: no rāṣṭrasaṃjñā na pi nigameṣu saṃjñā || 73 ||
520:419: rbodhyaṅgadhyāne na ca puna te niviṣṭāḥ |
520:422: no rāgaraktā na ca puna doṣaduṣṭā
520:427: no bhuya tasmin bhavati kadāci kāṅkṣā |
520:430: snehaṃ kurvatu jāyate anunayaḥ so'pī kileśo mahān
520:431: doṣaṃ kurvatu jāyate'sya pratigho vairaṃ bhayaṃ pāpakam |
520:432: dvāvetau vijahitvanā matigharā bodhāya ye prasthitāḥ
520:433: te bhontīha nararṣabhā daśabalā loke samabhyudgatāḥ || 78 ||
520:434: adhyātmaṃ prajahitva bāhyamapi co dharmasvabhāve sthitāḥ
520:436: no vā teṣu kadāci śīla śabalaṃ no cāpi kalmāṣatā
520:437: dvāvetau parivarjiyā matidharā budhyanti bodhiṃ śivām || 79 ||
520:438: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata-
520:493: na tasya krīḍā na ratī ca jāyate
520:551: yāsye ghoramahaṃ hyavīcinirayaṃ trāṇaṃ na me vidyate
520:552: pāpaṃ karma kṛtaṃ hyaniṣṭamasukhaṃ bhikṣurmayā ghātitaḥ |
520:553: muktvā rājya hu brahmacaryaparamaḥ pūjāṃ kariṣye varāṃ
520:555: putrāśco duhitṝḥ striyo gṛhapatī ye cā amātyā mama
520:556: śreṣṭhī naigama kṣatriyā bahuvidhāḥ sarveṣa bhāṣāmyaham |
520:557: agaruṃ padmaku candanaṃ suruciraṃ gandhāśca ye śobhanāḥ
520:559: śrutvā pārthivavākya sarvanagaraṃ gandhāṃ haritvā varāṃ
520:560: citikāṃ kṛtva manojñagandha rucirāmāropya bhikṣuṃ tahim |
520:561: agaruṃ padmaku candanaṃ satagaraṃ spṛkkāṃ tathā pāṭalāṃ
520:563: droṇyāṃ tasya kṛtaṃ śarīramabhavad yā māpitā bhikṣubhi-
520:564: steṣāṃ stūpu karitva rāja avacī pūjāsya kāmāmyaham |
520:565: puṣpaṃ mālya vilepanaṃ ca grahiya cchatrān patākāṃ dhvajāṃ -
520:567: traikālyaṃ divase vrajī mahipati bhikṣusya stūpaṃ tadā
520:568: triṣvapyadhvasu deśayī purīmakaṃ yatkiṃci pāpaṃ kṛtam |
520:569: varṣā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ taṃ kṣepayī duṣkṛtaṃ
520:570: śīlaṃ paści akhaṇḍa rakṣitu varaṃ śuddhaṃ śucī nirmalam || 112 ||
520:571: varṣā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ poṣī tadā poṣadhaṃ
520:572: bhinne co tada ātmabhāvi patito ghorāmavīciṃ punaḥ |
520:573: kṛtvā nirghṛṇa karma vedayi dukhaṃ kāmaṃnidānaṃ bahu
520:574: buddhā koṭisahasra pañcanavatiṃ vīrāgitā ye mayā || 113 ||
520:576: dvāṣaṣṭī pi ca kalpa koṭinayutā netrā mi bhinnā purā |
520:578: hastā cchinna anantakalpanayutān pādāśca karṇāḥ śirāḥ || 114 ||
520:580: duḥkhā vedana vedayāmi ca ciraṃ saṃsāraduḥkhārditaḥ |
520:582: tasmāt pāpu na kuryu adhvi tribhave yo bodhimicchecchivām || 115 ||
520:589: netrā ca mahyaṃ balaśo hṛtā kṣipitvā
520:605: te te mi duḥkhā tada anubhūtapūrvā
